oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Holiness Church of God in Jesus' Name tour, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hood, Ralph W.; Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording opening with a view of the Brown’s gravestones including that of Melinda F. Brown, John Wayne "Punkin" Brown, Jr., John Brown, Sr., and Brenda Brown. The pictures of the graves also include that of James Ray Williams and Jimmy Ray Williams, Jr. The recording captures an external view of the church where people are gathering, showing both the building and the grounds which include several more graves and an outhouse. The video then pans around to the surrounding countryside before ending.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region, Southern -- Religious life and customs; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region, Southern
Brown, Brenda; Brown, John, Sr.; Brown, John Wayne, Jr., 1964-1998; Brown, Melinda; Williams James Ray; Williams, James Ray, Jr.
Holiness Church of God in Jesus' Name (Carson Springs, Tenn.)
